DOC.brief_summary: Objective : The aim study determine efficacy suboccipital inhibitory manual therapy treatment migraine compare treatment base Myofascial Trigger Points ( MTrPs ) stretching , often hypersensitive patient migraine . Material method : 27 patient two group participate study : ) control group receive combined technique base MTrPs bilateral stretch trapezius sternocleidomastoid muscle ( SCM ) ; b ) experimental group apply technique apply control group plus suboccipital inhibition . The treatment last 8 week impact , disability quality life assess group .
DOC.detailed_description: Introduction Migraine highly prevalent disorder entail substantial cost . Manual therapy offer attractive option alternative medical treatment use combination therewith . Treatment focus soft tissue suboccitpital region study type headache migraine . Objective : The aim study determine efficacy suboccipital inhibitory manual therapy treatment migraine compare treatment base Myofascial Trigger Points ( MTrPs ) stretching , often hypersensitive patient migraine . Material method : 27 patient two group participate study : ) control group receive combined technique base MTrPs bilateral stretch trapezius sternocleidomastoid muscle ( SCM ) ; b ) experimental group apply technique apply control group plus suboccipital inhibition . The treatment last 8 week impact , disability quality life assess group .
DOC.criteria: Patients diagnose accord criterion establish IHS Patients exclude present headache type , headache trigger neck movement , present dizziness , hypertension , emotional stress , psychological disorder , cardiovascular disease pregnancy .
DOC.keyword: efficacy , manual therapy , migraine , quality life
